{"id":685976367,"lang":"swift","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1650719864,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/685976367/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    func numSquares(_ n: Int) -> Int {\n        var dpCache = Array(repeating: 0, count: n+1)\n        dpCache[1] = 1\n        \n        for currentNumber in 2...n {\n            var minSquareCount = Int.max\n            \n            for currentSquareNumber in 1...currentNumber {\n                let currentSquare = currentSquareNumber*currentSquareNumber\n                \n                if currentSquare > currentNumber { break }\n                \n                let remainingNumber = currentNumber-currentSquare\n                if dpCache[remainingNumber] < minSquareCount {\n                    minSquareCount = dpCache[remainingNumber]\n                }\n            }\n            \n            dpCache[currentNumber] = minSquareCount+1\n        }\n        \n        return dpCache[n]\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
